description: Creates a new DB security group. DB security groups control access to a DB instance. A DB security group controls access to EC2-Classic DB instances that are not in a VPC.

parameters.name: DBSecurityGroupName
parameters.description: The name for the DB security group. This value is stored as a lowercase string. Constraints: Must be 1 to 255 letters, numbers, or hyphens. First character must be a letter Can't end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens Must not be 'Default' Example: mysecuritygroup.

parameters.name: DBSecurityGroupDescription
parameters.description: The description for the DB security group.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Tags to assign to the DB security group. (dict) --- Metadata assigned to an Amazon RDS resource consisting of a key-value pair. For more information, see Tagging Amazon RDS resources in the Amazon RDS User Guide or Tagging Amazon Aurora and Amazon RDS resources in the Amazon Aurora User Guide. Key (string) --- A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$'). Value (string) --- A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroup
nested_items.description: Contains the details for an Amazon RDS DB security group.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: Provides the Amazon Web Services ID of the owner of a specific DB security group.

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroupName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the DB security group.

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroupDescription
nested_items.description: Provides the description of the DB security group.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: Provides the VpcId of the DB security group.

nested_items.name: EC2SecurityGroups
nested_items.description: Contains a list of EC2SecurityGroup elements.

nested_items.name: IPRanges
nested_items.description: Contains a list of IPRange elements.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the IP range. Status can be 'authorizing', 'authorized', 'revoking', and 'revoked'.

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB security group.
